channel.title: Omg read?!

item.title: Omg read?!
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“areptom, post:9, topic:418915”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=521454.msg3789108#msg3789108 date=1319142493]

yea that with the last } was just too late thats it

just add if you have this:
[tab] [tab] }
underneath add [tab] } too make
[tab][tab] }
[tab] } so it looks a bit like

           }
   }

that

tabs don’t matter in java. You dont need to worry about them at all

go into npcdrops, then come back to me when you didn’t tab

#edit; keep your rsgp.
[/quote]

thats not java. in JAVA tabs do not matter at all

This

	else if(in.equals("buy 3")){
		cost = 500;
		item = "Wood armor";
		slot = 2;
		buy();
	}

is the same as

else if(in.equals("buy 3")){cost = 500;item = "Wood armor";slot = 2;buy();} [/quote]

…you know what i mean…

and tabs make it easier to read.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg read?!
item.dc:creator: @Primate Primate
item.description:
@Primate wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:8, topic:418915”]no idea, i’ve never ‘coded’ a server ‘over’ dropbox.
Also you might get an ‘orphaned case’ error.

Orphan case;

example B needs to be outside of example A otherwise it’s orphaned.

[example A]
[example B]
[example A]

should be;

[example A]
[example A]
[example B].[/quote]

i got no errors, i’ll pm you tomorow, thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg read?!
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

no idea, i’ve never ‘coded’ a server ‘over’ dropbox.
Also you might get an ‘orphaned case’ error.

Orphan case;

example B needs to be outside of example A otherwise it’s orphaned.

[example A]
[example B]
[example A]

should be;

[example A]
[example A]
[example B].

Read full topic

item.title: Omg read?!
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

case 8528: //NOmad int n5 = 0; int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2)) n5 = Misc.random(1); else n5 = Misc.random(2); if (n5 == 0) { if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage npcs[i].forceChat("Die now, in a prison of ice!"); npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage? npcs[i].attackType = 2; if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ c.freezeTimer = 15; c.gfx0(369); c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); } } } else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Fill My Soul With Smoke!"); c.getPA().appendPoison(160); c.gfx0(391); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke."); } } else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Embrace Darkness!"); c.gfx0(382); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow."); } } else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP += 185; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.gfx0(377); c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health and increases his own."); } } else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) { npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm npcs[i].forceChat("There is...NO ESCAPE!"); npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2; } } else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath c.gfx0(2260); c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage; c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].attackType = 0; } else if (n5 == 7) { //First! if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; } }
Try that.

 case 8528: //NOmad
                        int n5 = 0;
                        int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3;
                        if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2))
                                n5 = Misc.random(1);
                        else
                                n5 = Misc.random(2);
                        if (n5 == 0) {
                        if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage
                                npcs[i].forceChat("Die now, in a prison of ice!");
                                        npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage?
                                        npcs[i].attackType = 2;
                                        if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){
                                        c.freezeTimer = 15;
                                c.gfx0(369);
                                c.sendMessage("You have been frozen.");
                                }
                               }
                        } else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage
                                if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) {
                                        npcs[i].forceChat("Fill My Soul With Smoke!");
                                        c.getPA().appendPoison(160);
                                        c.gfx0(391);
                                        npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                                c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke.");
                                }
                        } else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage
                                if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) {
                                        npcs[i].forceChat("Embrace Darkness!");
                                        c.gfx0(382);
                                        npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                        c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418);
                                                c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow.");
                                }
                        } else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage
                                if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) {
                                        npcs[i].HP += 185;
                                        npcs[i].attackType = 2;
                                        c.gfx0(377);
                                        c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health and increases his own.");
                                }
                        } else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil
                                if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) {
                                        npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm
                                        npcs[i].forceChat("There is...NO ESCAPE!");
                                        npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2;
                                }
                        } else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath
                                if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) {
                                        npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                                        npcs[i].forceChat("Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!");
                                        npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                        npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath
                                        c.gfx0(2260);
                                        c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage;
                                        c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage);
                                        c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
                                }
                        } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack
                                npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                                npcs[i].attackType = 0;       
                        } else if (n5 == 7) { //First!
                                if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) {
                                        npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                                        npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!");
                                        npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                }
